original_text: And when Moses had finished speaking with them, he put a veil over his face.
korean_text: 모세가 그들에게 말하기를 마치고 수건으로 자기 얼굴을 가렸더라

sentences.original_text: And when Moses had finished speaking with them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모세가 그들과 말하기를 마쳤을 때

sentences.original_text: he put a veil over his face.
